#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#define M 8388608
 
int main()
{
    int tt,n;
     long long int  t;
    scanf("%d",&tt);
    
    while(tt--)
    {
                 t=0;
                 scanf("%d",&n);
   	             t = pow(2,n-1)*(n*n-n+2);
   	             t%=M;
   	             t--;
		         if( t<0 )
			     t += M;
		         t%= M;
	             printf("%lld\n",t);
    }
    return 0;
}
